trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 代表呈現項目集合的控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that can contain multiple items, such as strings, objects, or other elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>是一種<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>可以包含多個項目，例如字串、 物件或其他項目。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control that contains the following different types of items:
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>控制項，其中包含下列不同類型的項目：

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: 字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>包含控制項<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。

trans-unit.source: ![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content")
trans-unit.target: ![以四種類型的內容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "四種類型的內容與清單方塊")

trans-unit.source: ListBox that contains multiple types of objects
trans-unit.target: 包含多種物件類型的 ListBox

trans-unit.source: Use either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to specify the collection to use to generate the content of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性來指定要用於產生之內容的集合您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to any type that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>實作的任何類型的屬性<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is typically used to display a data collection or to bind an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to a collection object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> 通常用來顯示資料集合，或繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>集合物件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> to populate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, you can add items by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想使用該物件會實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>填入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，您可以加入項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The items in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> can have different types.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>可以具有不同的類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> can contain one item that is a string and another item that is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>可包含是字串的一個項目與另一個項目是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection is set to read-only and fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合設為唯讀和固定大小。

trans-unit.source: This means that you cannot add items to the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，您無法將項目加入集合直接。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>, which will be an empty <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>正在使用中，將屬性設定為`null`移除集合，並還原使用量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>，它將會是空<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> type has a corresponding item container type.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>類型都有對應的項目容器類型。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding item container for each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> appends `Item` to its name.
trans-unit.target: 每個對應的項目容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>附加`Item`為其名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the item containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，項目容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它們是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly create a container type for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, but it is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確建立每個項目中的容器類型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，但不需要。

trans-unit.source: When you do not explicitly create the container type, one is generated that contains a data item in the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 當未明確建立的容器類型時，其中一個會產生包含項目集合中的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you bind a collection of string objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, you do not explicitly create <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> objects, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> will generate one for each string.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您將繫結到字串物件的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，您無法明確建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>物件，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>產生另一個用於每個字串。

trans-unit.source: You can access a generated item container by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來存取產生的項目容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Certain features of UI Automation do not work correctly when an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contains duplicate objects.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化的某些功能無法正常運作時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>包含重複的物件。

trans-unit.source: If an object appears multiple times, only the first instance appears in the automation tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件出現多次時，第一個執行個體會出現在自動化樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: (Two objects **x** and **y** are considered to be duplicates if `Object.Equals(x, y)` returns `true`.)
trans-unit.target: (兩個物件**x**和**y**會被視為重複項目如果`Object.Equals(x, y)`傳回`true`。)

trans-unit.source: While an object **x** is in use by an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> the value returned by **x.**`GetHashCode()`
trans-unit.target: 雖然物件**x**正在使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>所傳回的值**x。**`GetHashCode()`

trans-unit.source: must not change.
trans-unit.target: 必須不會變更。

trans-unit.source: Changes to this value are unsupported, and lead to unpredictable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 變更此值是不受支援，並且會導致無法預期的行為。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: The following examples demonstrate binding data to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範資料繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例會建立一種類別稱為`MyData`也就是簡單的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> object of an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to `MyData`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>至`MyData`。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control created in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>前一個範例中所建立的控制項。

trans-unit.source: ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")
trans-unit.target: ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to populate an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以填入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example adds the following different types of items to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將下列不同類型的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>:

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: 字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains other <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>包含其他控制項<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> created in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>前一個範例中所建立。

trans-unit.source: ![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content")
trans-unit.target: ![以四種類型的內容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "四種類型的內容與清單方塊")

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to use the different styling and templating-related properties that are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用不同的樣式和樣板化相關的屬性所提供的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>在此範例中會繫結的集合`Task`物件。

trans-unit.source: For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline.
trans-unit.target: 為方便示範，這個範例中的樣式和範本都是內嵌宣告的。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 下圖呈現時的範例螢幕擷取畫面。

trans-unit.source: ![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot")
trans-unit.target: ![ItemsControl 範例螢幕擷取畫面](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 範例螢幕擷取畫面")

trans-unit.source: Two other style-related properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> that are not shown here are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個其他樣式相關屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，不會顯示如下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified object as the child of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的物件做為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 物件的子系。

trans-unit.source: The string to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的字串。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified text string to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的文字字串加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />, which enables alternating containers to have a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 中的交替項目容器數，它可讓交替容器具有獨特的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The number of alternating item containers in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 中的交替項目容器數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性可讓您指定兩個或多個替代項目容器的外觀。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定替代的背景色彩，每個第三個項目中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is assigned to each item container in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>指派給每個項目容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> begins at 0, increments until it is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> minus 1, and then restarts at 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 從 0 開始，直到遞增<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>減 1 和 0 然後重新啟動。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> is 3 and there are seven items in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the following table lists the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for each item.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>為 3，7 中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>下, 表列出<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Position of Item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>
trans-unit.target: 中的項目位置 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers.
trans-unit.target: 有幾種的方法可用來指定不同的替代項目容器的外觀。

trans-unit.source: One method is to bind properties of the items container to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 一種方法是將繫結屬性的項目容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can then use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>來指定哪個值應該套用到具有特定的項目容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用觸發程序來變更項目容器的屬性的值而定的值及其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>) has alternating item containers (which are of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>) and specifies a different background and foreground for each one.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>(繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>) 具有替代項目容器 (類型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>)，並指定不同的背景和前景，針對每個。

trans-unit.source: The example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A> properties to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and provides an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> for each property.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，並提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>每一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example does the same as the previous example by using <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會執行相同的上一個範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>物件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the initialization of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> object is about to start.
trans-unit.target: 表示即將開始初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The container element.
trans-unit.target: 容器項目。

trans-unit.source: The item.
trans-unit.target: 項目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, undoes the effects of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，復原 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Object)" /> 方法的效果。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the container that belongs to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that owns the given container element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回擁有給定容器項目之目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 所屬的容器。

trans-unit.source: The element to return the container for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其傳回容器的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the container that belongs to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that owns the given element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回擁有給定項目之目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 所屬的容器。

trans-unit.source: The container that belongs to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that owns the given element or <see langword="null" /> if no such container exists.
trans-unit.target: 擁有給定容器項目之目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 所屬的容器，或是如果沒有這樣的容器存在則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> to return the container for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其傳回容器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />。

trans-unit.source: The element to return the container for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其傳回容器的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the container that belongs to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that owns the given container element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回擁有給定容器項目之指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 所屬的容器。

trans-unit.source: The container that belongs to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that owns the given element, if <paramref name="itemsControl" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="itemsControl" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，則為擁有給定項目之指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 所屬的容器。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="itemsControl" /> is <see langword="null" />, returns the closest container that belongs to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="itemsControl" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則傳回任何 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 所屬的最接近容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a path to a value on the source object to serve as the visual representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定來源物件上值的路徑，以當作此物件的視覺表示。

trans-unit.source: The path to a value on the source object.
trans-unit.target: 此來源物件上值的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This can be any path, or an XPath such as "@Name".
trans-unit.target: 這可以是任何路徑或 XPath，例如"@Name"。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This property is a simple way to define a default template that describes how to display the data objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是簡單的方式來定義描述如何顯示資料物件的預設範本。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the static resource named `places` is defined as a collection of `Place` objects, in which each `Place` object has a `CityName` property and a `State` property.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，靜態資源名為`places`做為集合定義`Place`中每個物件，`Place`物件具有`CityName`屬性和`State`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The prefix `src` is mapped to the namespace where the data source `Places` is defined.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞`src`對應至命名空間所在的資料來源`Places`定義。

trans-unit.source: The prefixes `scm` and `dat` are mapped to the <xref:System.ComponentModel> and <xref:System.Windows.Data> namespaces, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞`scm`和`dat`對應至<xref:System.ComponentModel>和<xref:System.Windows.Data>命名空間，分別。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a view of the data collection that is sorted by the city name and grouped by the state.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立一個檢視是依城市名稱排序，並依狀態分組的資料集合。

trans-unit.source: The view can be a binding source, as in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 檢視可以繫結來源，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: Because of the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath%2A>, each`Place` object is shown with its `CityName` value.
trans-unit.target: 因為指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath%2A>，每個`Place`物件會以顯示其`CityName`值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath%2A> is not specified and there is no <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> displays a string representation of each object in the underlying collection (in this case, "SDKSample.Place").
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath%2A>未指定，而且沒有任何<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>基礎的集合 （在此情況下，「 SDKSample.Place"） 中顯示每個物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates or identifies the element that is used to display the given item.
trans-unit.target: 建立或識別用來顯示指定項目的項目。

trans-unit.target: 用來顯示給定項目的項目。

trans-unit.source: The host element.
trans-unit.target: 裝載項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that the specified element hosts items for.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之項目 (Element) 為其裝載項目 (Item) 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that the specified element hosts items for, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定之項目 (Element) 為其裝載項目 (Item) 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A> is set to `true` on `element` in a style or if `element` is a panel created by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter> for an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is returned; otherwise, `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A>設`true`上`element`樣式中或如果`element`所建立的面板<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>會傳回，否則`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle" /> objects that define the appearance of each level of groups.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle" /> 物件的集合，這些物件定義群組每個層級的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle" /> objects that define the appearance of each level of groups.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle" /> 物件的集合，這些物件定義群組每個層級的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The entry at index 0 describes the top-level groups, the entry at index 1 describes the next level, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 索引 0 處之項目的描述最上層群組，位於索引 1 的項目描述下一個層級，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: If there are more levels of grouping than entries in the collection, the last entry is used for the extra levels.
trans-unit.target: 如果有更多的層級的群組集合中的項目比，最後一個項目會使用額外的層級。

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> that is bound to an <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> and the code-behind content that contains the logic to add and remove grouping.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>和程式碼後置內容包含邏輯，可加入和移除群組。

trans-unit.source: When the check box is checked, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is grouped by the `Type` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 當核取方塊、 內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>分組依據`Type`屬性。

trans-unit.source: Each group is of type <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 每個群組是類型<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewGroup>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplate%2A> is specified so that it appears as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> that displays the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewGroup.Name%2A> of each the group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplate%2A>指定，如此它會顯示為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>顯示<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewGroup.Name%2A>每個群組。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewGroup.Name%2A> is either `Work` or `Home`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewGroup.Name%2A>是`Work`或`Home`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a method that enables you to provide custom selection logic for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle" /> to apply to each group in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定一個方法，讓您可以為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle" /> 提供自訂選取邏輯，以套用至集合中的每個群組。

trans-unit.source: A method that enables you to provide custom selection logic for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle" /> to apply to each group in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 一個方法，可讓您為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle" /> 提供自訂選取邏輯，以套用至集合中的每個群組。

trans-unit.source: The item to check.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的項目是否為 (或可以成為) 其本身的容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is (or is eligible to be) its own container; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsItemItsOwnContainerOverride%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The item to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的項目。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的項目是否為 (或可以成為) 其本身的容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is (or is eligible to be) its own container; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether case is a condition when searching for items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，其表示在搜尋項目時，大小寫是否也是條件之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if text searches are case-sensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串搜尋區分大小寫，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchCaseSensitive%2A> property specifies whether the case determines whether an item is selected in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchEnabled%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchCaseSensitive%2A>屬性會指定是否案例會決定是否要在選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contain two strings that differ only in case, such as "ITEM" and "item", the first string will always be selected, regardless of the case of the input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>包含兩個只有大小寫不同，例如"ITEM"和"item"，第一個字串一律會選取，不區分大小寫的輸入的字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> that contains the strings, "DOG", "CAT", "dog", and "cat".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>包含字串、"DOG"、"數據機"、"dog"和"cat"。

trans-unit.source: The example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchCaseSensitive%2A> property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchCaseSensitive%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>。

trans-unit.source: If the check box is selected and the user types "dog", the third item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經選取該核取方塊，且使用者"dog"，輸入中的第三個項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>已選取。

trans-unit.source: If the user unselects the check box and types "dog", the first item is selected because case is not a condition of the search.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者取消選取核取方塊和型別的"dog"，因為案例不是搜尋的條件，會選取第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchCaseSensitive" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchCaseSensitive" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch" /> is enabled on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch" /> 執行個體上是否啟用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" /> that is copied to each item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定複製到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" /> 中每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" /> that is copied to each item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 複製到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" /> 中每個項目的<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A> property, each item container gets a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> that has the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>, but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>, are specific to the data for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>屬性，每個項目容器取得<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>，具有相同的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>物件當做<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>，但屬性，例如描述之繫結中，資料<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>，是特定資料的每個項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: You must access the item container's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item.
trans-unit.target: 您必須存取項目容器的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>執行作業例如驗證資料，並檢查是否有錯誤的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer, and then checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會提示使用者輸入多個客戶，並將銷售人員指派給每個客戶的應用程式的一部分，然後檢查 銷售人員和客戶屬於相同的區域。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> so the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>, `AreasMatch`, will validate each item.
trans-unit.target: 範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>所以<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>， `AreasMatch`，將會驗證每個項目。

trans-unit.source: The example also creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that displays validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>顯示驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> is bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> that it gets from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteForProperty?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>它從取得<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteForProperty?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteForProperty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is the item container that has the error.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteForProperty?displayProperty=nameWithType>是發生錯誤的項目容器。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the item container and calls <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A> on the container's <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> to validate the data.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取得項目容器和呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>在容器上<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>來驗證資料。

trans-unit.source: You must validate the data by calling a method on the item container's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>, not on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須在項目容器上呼叫方法來驗證資料<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>、 不是在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator" /> that is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator" /> that is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 與控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A> is responsible for generating the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] for its host, such as an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A>是負責產生[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]對於其主控件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: It maintains the association between the items in the data view of the control and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: 它會維護資料的檢視控制項中的項目與對應的關聯<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> has an associated item container that contains a data item in the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>具有相關聯的項目容器，其中包含項目集合中的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A> property to access the item container that is associated with your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A>屬性相關聯的項目容器的存取您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control and you want to get a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> based on its index or its associated data item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>控制項，而且您想要取得<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>根據索引或其相關聯的資料的項目，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to get the index or data item that is associated with a given generated container element.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來取得與指定產生之容器項目相關聯的資料或索引項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator> interface is also used in advanced scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator>介面也用在進階案例中。

trans-unit.source: Typically, advanced applications that have their own implementation of a virtualizing panel call members of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，有自己的虛擬化的面板實作的進階應用程式呼叫介面的成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> that is applied to the container element generated for each item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" />，以套用至為各項目 (item) 所產生的容器項目 (element)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> that is applied to the container element generated for each item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" />，以套用至為各項目 (item) 所產生的容器項目 (element)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You use this property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>屬性設定會影響包含資料的項目之項目的外觀樣式。

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，產生的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它們是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>視覺自訂提供很大的彈性並提供許多設定樣式和範本的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To affect the layout of the items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要影響的項目配置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用群組控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify the visualization of data objects, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定資料物件的視覺效果，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about when to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關何時指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *ResourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, `StaticResource` reference to a style is usually recommended for performance.
trans-unit.target: 除非樣式本身包含的系統資源或使用者偏好設定，例如潛在的執行階段參考的參考，否則`StaticResource`參考樣式，通常建議使用的效能。

trans-unit.source: *StyleResourceKey*
trans-unit.target: *StyleResourceKey*

trans-unit.source: `x:Key` string value referring to the style being requested as a resource.
trans-unit.target: `x:Key` 字串值，參考要求的資源做的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Consider the following data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>:
trans-unit.target: 請考慮下列資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>:

trans-unit.source: To create a style for the elements that contain the data items, create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> style, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立含資料的項目元素的樣式，建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>樣式，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The style is applied to all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> elements within the scope the style is defined in.
trans-unit.target: 樣式會套用到所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>樣式定義在範圍內的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> is the container element for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>為的容器項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, an alternative to the preceding is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to the defined style.
trans-unit.target: 因此，上述的替代方式是設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>定義樣式。

trans-unit.source: To do that, give the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> style an `x:Key` so it is available as a resource:
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>樣式`x:Key`讓它可做為資源：

trans-unit.source: Next, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property to the resource, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 接下來，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性至資源，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: Both of the preceding scenarios produce the same result.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個前一個案例中產生相同的結果。

trans-unit.source: However, one of the advantages of making the style available as a resource is that you can reuse the style.
trans-unit.target: 不過，其中提供可用樣式為資源的優點是您可以重複使用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property explicitly can also provide greater readability.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性明確也可以提供更大的可讀性。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [Introduction to Styling and Templating Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160010).
trans-unit.target: 完整的範例，請參閱[簡介設定樣式和範本化範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160010)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed to illustrate the function of the different styling and templating related properties provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例為了說明不同的函式設定樣式和範本相關的屬性所提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>在此範例中會繫結的集合`Task`物件。

trans-unit.source: For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline.
trans-unit.target: 為方便示範，這個範例中的樣式和範本都是內嵌宣告的。

trans-unit.source: The following is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered:
trans-unit.target: 下圖是範例呈現的畫面：

trans-unit.source: ![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot")
trans-unit.target: ![ItemsControl 範例螢幕擷取畫面](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 範例螢幕擷取畫面")

trans-unit.source: Two other style-related properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> that are not shown here are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個其他樣式相關屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，不會顯示如下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets custom style-selection logic for a style that can be applied to each generated container element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以套用至每個產生之容器項目的樣式的自訂樣式選取邏輯。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector" /> object that contains logic that chooses the style to use as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector" /> 物件，其中包含選擇樣式來做為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle" /> 的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性設定會影響包含資料的項目之項目的外觀樣式。

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，產生的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它們是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one style defined and need to supply logic to choose which one to apply, then you use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有多個樣式定義，而且需要提供邏輯，以選擇要套用，則您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>屬性而非<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，是否這個屬性就會忽略<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>視覺自訂提供很大的彈性並提供許多設定樣式和範本的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To affect the layout of the items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要影響的項目配置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用群組控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify the visualization of data objects, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定資料物件的視覺效果，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about when to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關何時指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection used to generate the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來產生 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 之內容的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection that is used to generate the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來產生 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 之內容的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空集合。

trans-unit.source: This property may be used to add items to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可能用來將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: Adding a child to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 新增的子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>物件隱含地將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] via the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只能在設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]集合語法所示，透過或存取的集合物件，例如使用的各種方法`Add`。

trans-unit.source: The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, and the collection itself is read-write.
trans-unit.target: 用來存取集合物件本身屬性是唯讀的且集合本身讀寫。

trans-unit.source: Note that you use either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to specify the collection that should be used to generate the content of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性來指定應該用來產生的內容集合您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection is made read-only and fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合由唯讀和固定大小。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is in use, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>, which will be an empty <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>正在使用中，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性`null`移除集合，並還原使用量對<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>，它將會是空<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *OneOrMoreElements*
trans-unit.target: *OneOrMoreElements*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following examples demonstrate binding data to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範資料繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例會建立一種類別稱為`MyData`也就是簡單的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> object of an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to `MyData`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>至`MyData`。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control created in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>前一個範例中所建立的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to populate an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以填入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example adds the following different types of items to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將下列不同類型的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>:

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: 字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains other <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>包含其他控制項<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> created in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>前一個範例中所建立。

trans-unit.source: ![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content")
trans-unit.target: ![以四種類型的內容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "四種類型的內容與清單方塊")

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> is a view, so you can use the view-related functionalities such as sorting, filtering, and grouping.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>為檢視，因此您可以使用檢視相關的功能，例如排序、 篩檢與群組。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, `myListBox`, you can do the following to sort the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， `myListBox`，您可以執行下列工作來排序的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, `Content` is the name of the property to sort by.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`Content`是要排序之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Note that when you do this, if the control is bound to a collection directly, the default collection view is used, and the sort criteria are applied to all other controls bound to the same collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，當您這樣做，如果控制項直接連到集合，使用預設集合檢視時，而且排序準則會套用至所有其他控制項會直接繫結至相同的集合。

trans-unit.source: The view will not be the default view if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property is bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
trans-unit.target: 如果檢視將不是預設檢視<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is bound directly to a collection, then you can do the following to get the default view:
trans-unit.target: 如果您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>直接繫結集合，可以執行下列命令以取得預設檢視：

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can specify filtering, sorting, and grouping criteria in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or code by using a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在其中指定篩選、 排序及群組中的準則[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]或程式碼使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>。

trans-unit.source: The container element to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 的容器項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that owns the specified container element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回擁有指定之容器項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that owns the specified container element.
trans-unit.target: 擁有指定容器項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that defines the panel that controls the layout of items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣板，這個樣板會定義控制項目配置的面板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate" /> that defines the panel to use for the layout of the items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate" />，可定義用於項目配置的面板。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> is an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate" /> that specifies a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 的預設值是用來指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate> specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，預設值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, the default uses <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WrapPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>，預設會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WrapPanel>。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>, the default uses <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>，預設會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>。

trans-unit.source: To affect the layout of the items in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, you use this property to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 若要會影響配置中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，您可以使用這個屬性來指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>視覺自訂提供很大的彈性並提供許多設定樣式和範本的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>屬性設定會影響包含資料的項目之項目的外觀樣式。

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，產生的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它們是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用群組控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify the visualization of the data objects, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定資料物件的視覺效果，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: To create a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, you can create a template that specifies a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> and set it as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，您可以建立範本，指定在水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>並將它做為設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> <xref:System.Windows.Style> that creates a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox><xref:System.Windows.Style>會建立在水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to create a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> that has rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>建立水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>的圓角。

trans-unit.source: In this example, instead of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property as in previous example, the horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is specified within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，而不是設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>如先前範例所示的屬性，水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>內所指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A> property is set to `true` on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, indicating that the generated items should go in the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A>屬性設定為`true`上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>，指出產生的項目應該放在 [面板]。

trans-unit.source: When you specify it this way, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> cannot be replaced by the user of the control without using a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，指定當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>無法取代控制項的使用者，而不使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, only do this if you know you would not want the panel to be replaced without the use of a template.
trans-unit.target: 因此，只有這樣如果您知道您不想要被取代，而不使用範本的面板。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can do the following to achieve the same results.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以執行下列命令來達到相同的結果。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter> creates the panel for the layout of the items based on what is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter>建立所指定的項目為基礎的項目配置的面板<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection used to generate the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來產生 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 之內容的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is used to generate the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來產生 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 之內容的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: **Content Model:** This property may be used to add items to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: **內容模型：**這個屬性可能用來將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: A common scenario is to use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> to display a data collection, or to bind an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to a collection object.
trans-unit.target: 常見的案例是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>顯示資料收集，或繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>集合物件。

trans-unit.source: To bind an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to a collection object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>給集合的物件，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property supports <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWay> binding by default.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性支援<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWay>預設繫結。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection is made read-only and fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合由唯讀和固定大小。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>, which will be an empty <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>正在使用中，將屬性設定為`null`移除集合，並還原使用量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>，它將會是空<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is not in use, the value of this property is `null`, and setting it to `null` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>是不在使用中，這個屬性的值是`null`，並將它設定為`null`沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you do not need to implement your own collections.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下您不需要實作您自己的集合。

trans-unit.source: Instead, consider using <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> or other existing collections.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，請考慮使用<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>或其他現有的集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Collection Objects Used as Binding Source" in [Binding Sources Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 集合的物件使用做為繫結來源 」[繫結來源概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md)。
